name: The lost Walkman
description:
The lost Walkman

The lost Walkman is a game made by evilc00kie and Tch1b0, in which you play the character Tex, and try to find out why you got kicked out of the Club.

Movement:  
  • D or ARROW_RIGHT             - move right
  • A  or ARROW_LEFT               - move left
  • W or SPACE or ARROW_UP - jump
  • SHIFT                                     - run faster
  • F                                              - Hit
Cassette selection:
  • 1 - Cassette 1
  • 2 - Cassette 2
  • 3 - Cassette 3

Music and Sound effects by Noisetäter.

Here is the Source code on Github
